DOC.brief_title: Influence Heavy Metals Exposure Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Outcome
DOC.detailed_description: Concentration heavy metal measure blood , urine , semen fluid follicular fluid IVF patient . Study group : poor prognosis patient : repeat IVF failure , implantation failure , poor ovarian response , low sperm quality ( accord WHO criterion ) Control group : Good prognosis patient . Normal sperm count . Heavy metal concentration measure use atomic absorption spectrometer , correlate IVF outcome : number mature oocyte obtain , fertilization , embryos quality , reproductive outcome post embryo transfer .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Age female patient : < =39 Age male patient : 1850 Smoking Alcohol/drug abuse Longterm/chronic medication Severe health/mental problem Dental transplant Fragile X mutation Fertility preservation
